response.overview: Mortals Electric is a vivacious interaction between a multi-layered, abstract spatial graphics and besieging audibility, inspired by a sharp, restrained and lucid aestheticism closely related to the utilised technology. Layers of strobing organic structures, deep machinic drones and waves of digital noise introduce a powerful provocation to the limits of human sensory apparatus, opening an unusual 360Â° spatiality to the new forms, which definitely presents a challenge to the acquired cinematic experience.
response.title: Mortals Electric
